get.summary: Get general blockchain information
Search the blockchain

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Full or partial wallet address, block ID, username, public key or transaction ID

get.summary: Get node configuration information
Get node crypto configuration information
Get node fee statistics
Get node status information
Get node sync status information
See node peer status information

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The node version by which the resources will be filtered

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

get.summary: Find a single peer by its IP address

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP address of the peer

get.summary: List blocks or search for blocks meeting specific criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the block to be returned

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: previouBlock
parameters.description: Previous block id chained to the block to be returned

parameters.name: payloadHash
parameters.description: Hash of the transaction payload of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: generatorPublicKey
parameters.description: Public key of the block producer that produced the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the block producer that produced the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Exact height of the block to be returned

parameters.name: height.from
parameters.description: Earliest height of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: height.to
parameters.description: Latest height of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: Signature of the block to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Exact time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.from
parameters.description: Earliest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.to
parameters.description: Latest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: numberOfTransactions
parameters.description: Exact number of transactions inside the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: numberOfTransactions.from
parameters.description: Minimum number of transactions inside the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: numberOfTransactions.to
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions inside the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalAmount
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalAmount.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalAmount.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFee
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of the fees of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFee.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of the fees of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFee.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of the fees of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFeeBurned
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of the fees that were burned in all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFeeBurned.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of the fees that were burned in all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFeeBurned.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of the fees that were burned in all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: reward
parameters.description: Exact block reward amount of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: reward.from
parameters.description: Lowest block reward amount of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: reward.to
parameters.description: Highest block reward amount of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: payloadLength
parameters.description: Exact transaction payload length of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: payloadLength.from
parameters.description: Minimum transaction payload length of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: payloadLength.to
parameters.description: Maximum transaction payload length of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

get.summary: Find a single block by its ID or height

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: ID or height of block to return

get.summary: Find block production failures in the last X days

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the block producer that failed to produce the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Exact height when the block production failure occurred to be returned

parameters.name: height.from
parameters.description: Earliest height of the block production failure(s) to be returned

parameters.name: height.to
parameters.description: Latest height of the block production failure(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Exact time, in seconds since the epoch, when the block production failure occurred to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.from
parameters.description: Earliest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block production failure(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.to
parameters.description: Latest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block production failure(s) to be returned

get.summary: List block producers or search for block producers meeting specific criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the block producers to be returned

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: The public key of the block producer to be returned

parameters.name: resignation
parameters.description: Whether the block producer(s) to be returned have resigned permanently or temporarily

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the block producer to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.burned
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all fees burned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.burned.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all fees burned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.burned.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all fees burned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.retaianed
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all fees retained by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.retained.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all fees retained by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.retained.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all fees retained by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.total
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all fees from transactions in blocks produced by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.total.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all fees from transactions in blocks produced by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.fees.total.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all fees from transactions in blocks produced by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.rewards
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all block rewards earned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.rewards.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all block rewards earned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.rewards.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all block rewards earned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.donations
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all donations by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.donations.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all donations by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.donations.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all donations by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.total
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all unburned fees plus block rewards earned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.total.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all unburned fees plus block rewards earned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: collected.total.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all unburned fees plus block rewards earned by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.percent
parameters.description: Exact total vote percentage of the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.percent.from
parameters.description: Minimum total vote percentage of the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.percent.to
parameters.description: Maximum total vote percentage rate of the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.votes
parameters.description: Exact amount of vote weight for the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.votes.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount of vote weight for the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.votes.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount of vote weight for the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.voters
parameters.description: Exact number of voters for the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.voters.from
parameters.description: Minimum number of voters for the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votesReceived.voters.to
parameters.description: Maximum number of voters for the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.failed
parameters.description: Exact number of block production failures by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.failed.from
parameters.description: Minimum number of block production failures by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.failed.to
parameters.description: Maximum number of block production failures by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.produced
parameters.description: Exact number of blocks produced by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.produced.from
parameters.description: Minimum number of blocks produced by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.produced.to
parameters.description: Maximum number of blocks produced by the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.reliability
parameters.description: Exact reliability rate of the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.reliability.from
parameters.description: Lowest reliability rate of the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.reliability.to
parameters.description: Highest reliability rate of the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: rank
parameters.description: Exact rank of the block producer to be returned

parameters.name: rank.from
parameters.description: Lowest rank of the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: rank.to
parameters.description: Highest rank of the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Exact node version running on the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: version.from
parameters.description: Earliest node version running on the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: version.to
parameters.description: Latest node version running on the block producer(s) to be returned

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Exact height when the block production failure occurred to be returned

parameters.name: height.from
parameters.description: Earliest height of the block production failure(s) to be returned

parameters.name: height.to
parameters.description: Latest height of the block production failure(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Exact time, in seconds since the epoch, when the block production failure occurred to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.from
parameters.description: Earliest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block production failure(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.to
parameters.description: Latest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block production failure(s) to be returned

get.summary: List transactions or search for transactions meeting specific criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The transaction id to be returned

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blockHeight
parameters.description: The exact block height containing the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blockHeight.from
parameters.description: The earliest block height containing the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blockHeight.to
parameters.description: The latest block height containing the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: senderPublicKey
parameters.description: Public key of the sender of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: senderId
parameters.description: Address of the sender of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: recipientId
parameters.description: Address of the recipient of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: Memo string of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: extraSignature
parameters.description: The public key associated with an extra signature registration transaction to be returned

parameters.name: registration
parameters.description: The username associated with a registration transaction to be returned

parameters.name: resignation
parameters.description: The type of resignation transaction to be returned

parameters.name: ipfsHash
parameters.description: The IPFS hash of an IPFS transaction to be returned

parameters.name: amount.received
parameters.description: Exact received amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.received.from
parameters.description: Minimum received amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.received.to
parameters.description: Maximum received amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.sent
parameters.description: Exact sent amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.sent.from
parameters.description: Minimum sent amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.sent.to
parameters.description: Maximum sent amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: Exact fee, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: fee.from
parameters.description: Minimum fee, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: fee.to
parameters.description: Maximum fee, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Exact time, in seconds since the epoch, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.from
parameters.description: Earliest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.to
parameters.description: Latest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Exact nonce of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: nonce.from
parameters.description: Minimum nonce of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: nonce.to
parameters.description: Maximum nonce of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: vote.percent
parameters.description: Exact percentage allocation of a vote in the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: vote.percent.from
parameters.description: Minimum percentage allocation of a vote in the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: vote.percent.to
parameters.description: Maximum percentage allocation of a vote in the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: vote.username
parameters.description: Name of the block producer included in a vote in the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method
